description: easy to use, come with good interface.

FamiStudio lets you create music in the style of old NES and Famicom music, while also providing tools to export your songs in formats which can actually be played back on those consoles themselves, making the app useful both for game and homebrew developers and for more casual chiptune creators. It uses a piano roll-based UI which should be very familiar to anyone who's used a modern DAW before, and should be decently accessible even to people who don't have experience with other chip music programs. It lacks some advanced features that more experienced users of apps like FamiTracker and its many forks might miss (though there are some things that FamiStudio does better!), but the developer is very active and continues to add new features regularly.
summary: A comfy NES/Famicom music creation tool with lots of potential
